name: Add Google Sheets rows from Completed Signority Documents
description: Every time a new Signority document is completed, Make will automatically add a new Google Sheets row. This example uses [this sheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XQZRW8qYjLAhp_GBublGRRZvLdXsF0LAiPt24Xk28-A/edit#gid=0).
